title: Trump Lawsuit EXCLUSIVE: Will Hillary & Conspiring Dems FINALLY Face Consequences? | Guest: Donald J. Trump | 3/25/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show with an interview with former President Donald Trump regarding his lawsuit against Hillary Clinton and the DNC. Glenn highlights the dangers of a programmable digital currency. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Putin’s losing war against Ukraine and the Ketanji Brown Jackson confirmation hearing. Alex Epstein, author of "The Moral Case for Fossil Fuels," joins to discuss the fascistic movement to cripple the fuel industry. Glenn and Stu discuss how relying solely on green industry is not sustainable.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
